channel.title: Items keept on death
channel.description:
ok im running a 317 delta based server and i on my client i have an item for items keept on death. when i click it nothing happens but button is 58254 i was wondering if there was a way if i could make it to where it showed what 0 1,3,4 items you keep on death (4 and 1 if you protect have prayer). i dont need the interface to pop up just a message saying what you keep. if someone could plz help with the codes that would be great. or another method to view items keept on death.
thanks alot to all help
